summary: i know you said to request drabbles before & im not sure if you’re still taking them but can I request a reader x chris evans...
question: i know you said to request drabbles before & im not sure if you’re still taking them but can I request a reader x chris evans where the reader is a dancer, but she does dance in heels (not sure if you know what i’m talking about - like dancers Aliya Janell on youtube to help you understand) and she takes chris to a class and it just ends up being super funny? thank you!
answer:
Step, step — slide — and step.

Chris tries to remember it, he really does but being so close to you, so hot and so close — it makes him lose his focus and rise from his gaze at his feet and to your face.

You’re gorgeous under the brazen lights of the dance studio. Baby hairs natural in honesty and colour are slick, curled and pasted along your beaded sweaty forehead; your lips — oh, dear — your lips all roughed in colour and plump in shape twist and shape under the biting of your pearly white teeth.

Chris doesn’t feel you slow down the pace until your eyes are stuck on his, your breasts still pressed tight against each other’s. He drops his gaze down to your cleavage “Chris,” A warning, a simple but effecting one, Chris raises his gaze meekly to meet yours. Blazing, and so hot. “Eyes up here, big boy.”

Chris swallows the lump in his throat and rearranges his black trouser pants to comfort and console his arousal — maybe even stop it from growing much more. “Sorry,” he blurts with a shy smile. “You know I can’t help it…” Chris allows his voice to trial and linger, ideas already stewing and bubbling deep in your head from previous dance sessions.

Your body.

The heat.

The raw passion.

The fierce love on display.

All of it made Chris’ blood boil with lust and greed — a greed to devour you here and now.

“Alright I think we should call it a night.” Chris eyes snap out of their trance into nowhere and flicker back to you. You smile knowingly at Chris — no judgements being passed.

“Shall we?” You waltz away from Chris and bend down to pick up your training bag — all to add fuel to the fire, your legs long and tantalising in the yoga pants you wore. Chris couldn’t help but rearrange himself there and then, more to show off his arousal than meekly hide it.

“Yeah,” he breathes and dabs a handful of your ass. “Let’s.”

summary: Do you think Chris is a white feminist or has some qualities of it?
question: Do you think Chris is a white feminist or has some qualities of it?
answer:
I have to say that I barely know what the hell a white feminist is so I can’t say whether he is one or have qualities of it

I will say he’s like.. a basic liberal who more than likely seems to want to hear everyone’s views on something, regardless if their opinion is harmful? if that makes sense?

take his political thingy into account: it’s a website where democrats and republicans can voice their opinion or whatever yes? and there’s a lot of republicans who have harmful thoughts/opinions but he wants to give them a chance to have their voices heard?

i mean at the end of the day, he’s a rich, white man and a lot of things don’t necessarily affect him but I do like that he seems to make an effort into learning about social/political issues 

am I making sense? bc idk if I truly answered this in the way I wanted to lol

summary: Corlys Lesewelt - Serienmittwoch: Welche männlichen Filmschauspieler würdest du gerne mal in einer Fernsehserie sehen?
title: Corlys Lesewelt - Serienmittwoch: Welche männlichen Filmschauspieler würdest du gerne mal in einer Fernsehserie sehen?
body:
Corlys Lesewelt – Serienmittwoch: Welche männlichen Filmschauspieler würdest du gerne mal in einer Fernsehserie sehen?

Schon wieder Mittwoch, aber das macht nichts, denn ich habe tatsächlich drei Tage frei um Überstunden abzubauen. Ich freue mich so sehr darüber, ich könnte die ganze Zeit tanzen. Natürlich nehme ich mir wieder einiges vor und kann auch alle Beiträge für den Blog vorbereiten. Das freut mich am meisten. Vor allem will ich aber auch die Sonne genießen. Jetzt aber erst einmal Corlys Serienmittwoch.…

View On WordPress

body:
If you had to pick a place to live and one person to live with, what would you pick?

@jobean12-blog i didn’t want to break the beach + seb streak so i made my own thread lmao

i would live iiiiiiin

Edinburgh, Scotland

wiiiiiiiiith

my buddy baby boy, of course

like above all else

chris evans/steve rogers

is my favorite.

my golden child.

like if i had to choose,

out of all my faves.

i’d pick him.

without a SECOND THOUGHT.

🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️
